EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Pivotal@NYSE_Q413.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are registered for the Pivotal workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your registration is confirmed Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Agile Development Workshop with Pivotal. Please see event details below:
Date: Tuesday, July 11, 2013 Time: 9am - 12pm (lunch will be provided) Where: EMC Support Center, 11747 Lone Peak Pkwy, Draper, UT 84020
Should you have any questions or would like to contact me, please email me at wmaddux@gopivotal.com <mailto:wmaddux@gopivotal.com>.
I look forward to seeing you.
Best,
Ward Maddux Stay current on all things Pivotal. Visit our Blog>> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/> Read Pivotal's latest news. Visit our Resources page>> <http://www.gopivotal.com/resources>
